SELECT RR.RRNUM ,RR.RNUM ,RR.RRCONTENT ,RR.RRDATE ,RR.MID ,M.MNICK FROM TB_BOARD B ,TB_MEMBER M ,TB_REPLY R ,TB_RREPLY RR WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.BNUM = #{bnum} AND B.BNUM = R.BNUM AND R.RNUM = RR.RNUM AND M.MID = RR.MID ORDER BY RRNUM DESC
